description: Easily create AI-generated videos from text prompts with Clipfly's AI video generator online. Get stunning AI visuals in minutes without any skills.
introduction: Clipfly is an all-in-one AI video editor that allows users to easily create and enhance videos using AI technology. It offers a variety of tools for video editing, including AI-powered features for generating videos from text, adding voiceovers, and more.
features: Preview and select frames before generating videos
Rich stock resources including fonts, stickers, music, and images
targetPeople: Content creators, marketers, social media managers, video editors, and anyone looking to create engaging videos easily

faqs.question: What is Clipfly?
faqs.answer: Clipfly is an all-in-one AI video editor that allows users to easily create and enhance videos using AI technology.

faqs.question: How does Clipfly generate videos from text?
faqs.answer: Clipfly uses AI technology to recognize your text prompt and transform it into a static frame, which is then converted into a dynamic video clip. By combining multiple dynamic clips, you can create a comprehensive AI-generated movie.

faqs.question: Is Clipfly a web-based tool?
faqs.answer: Yes, Clipfly is a web-based tool, so you can create captivating videos anytime, anywhere, without any software installations.

faqs.question: What are the pricing options for Clipfly?
faqs.answer: Clipfly offers a free basic plan and a Pro plan that costs $99.99 per year.

faqs.question: What additional features does the Pro plan offer?
faqs.answer: The Pro plan offers watermark-free exports, higher export resolution (up to 4K), access to a larger library of royalty-free audio, stock stickers, images, videos, text fonts, and 2GB of cloud storage.
